ygData.subject: RE: Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
ygData.msgSnippet: I have only RARELY been attacked running through lavastorm -- even without any form of invisibility. My level 10 bard went to the Temple to turn a Lambent
ygData.messageBody:
I have only RARELY been attacked running through lavastorm -- even without
any form of invisibility.
My level 10 bard went to the Temple to turn a Lambent stone in for the
Darkwood staves. No invisibility.
And she turned off speed song to avoid running into lava. No problems
whatsoever.

Sarah HEacock

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 1:31 PM
>To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Temple of Sol Ro (was:Ro quest armor pieces)
>
>
>From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
>The Temple of Solusek Ro is in Lavastorm across from the SolA entrance. You
>can go there at lvl 1 (well, if you can run through LS without being
>attacked) because they are indifferent to everybody (unless you hail the
>Genie, doh!). Also, our armor is NOT the Armor of Ro as the
>subject implies.
>That is the Paladin armor.
>
>Drizben D'Vorn
>Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
>Oblivion Knight of the 30th Circle
>
